input.sentences: the family all went on a hike together .
this grave had the name of someone we knew .
we watched the sun set through the trees .
we ended the day by looking at the ocean .
output.sentences: The entire family went on a long nice hike.
On our hike we passed the local cemetry and stoped for a visit there.
We saw some very old graves and some familiar names.
later on we watched a beautiful sunset behind some trees.
It was a beautiful day for a hike  close to the ocean.
